reuters.title: FED SETS 1.5 BILLION DLR CUSTOMER REPURCHASE, FED SAYS
reuters.body: Sapporo Breweries Ltd is launching a 100 mln Swiss franc, 4-5/8 pct, five-year guaranteed notes issue priced at 100-1/4 pct, lead manager Swiss Bank Corp said. The issue is guaranteed by Fuji Bank and payment date is March 17. REUTER 
